name: SMASHING THE BATTLE
description:
In the year 2085 a huge multiplex construction site has become victim of a massive scale hacking incident and the construction robots have started attacking the workers on site. What could have possibly happened?

Experience the fights for yourself, taking control of two beautiful heroines as you battle through their stories to the end.

Features
Two storylines
Play through the storylines of two heroines to discover their destinies.

Two distinct play styles
Each heroine features unique gameplay that leads to different stories with new challenges.

Hack-and-slash / Shootâ€˜em Up Hybrid
Fight off enemies with devastating attacks filling the whole screen with explosives!
Evade the oncoming attacks and squeeze between the danger to let off attacks and destroy the enemies.

Fan-art From Various Artists
Fan-art drawn by various artists during the production are included as bonus content that can be unlocked as you play through the game.
intro:
Stylish hack-and-slash action with two 
stunning heroines smashing robots to pieces!
